title: "Color-sensing tech to remove dirt from solar panels"
excerpt: "South African researchers have developed a new cleaning system for solar panels that uses a color-sensing light-to-frequency converter to detect dirt. It can reportedly remove around 95% of the dust from a PV panel in less than a minute,"
